title: Leadership & Management
desc: You **must** develop strong leadership skills to manage a team effectively. You **don’t have to** be an expert at first, but practice is essential.

title: Effective Communication
desc: You **have to** improve your communication skills to work efficiently in a team. You **mustn’t** ignore the importance of active listening.

title: Financial Management
desc: You **must** understand financial reports and budgeting to run a business successfully. You **don’t have to** be an accountant, but basic knowledge is necessary.
